attributes.action: Bring back death penalty for acts of terrorism in the UK
attributes.additional_details:
The two terrorists who killed a heroic soldier in London are alive and well in hospital. When they are well enough they will be tried and sent to the joke that is the UK jail. I purpose that UK national terrorists who commit crimes against the state should be tried for the death penalty. These people are not worthy of our prisons to keep spreading their sick messages of hate.

Please sign this petition so these sick individuals get what they deserve.
